title: How to Attract a Taurus Woman

steps.title: Be patient and take your time to get to know her.
steps.content: Be patient and take your time to get to know her. As a steady earth sign, Taurus women usually want something real—not a casual romance or a short-lived fling. They can also be shy or reserved at first. [1] X Research source Because of these things, Taurus women tend to be pretty intentional about the people they date, and they won’t let just anyone into their circle. If you want to grab her attention, put in the time to get to know her slowly. This will show her you’re serious about her! Don't worry about getting too deep into the friend zone—because Tauruses value trust and reliability so much, it can actually work in your favor if you two start out as friends . [2] X Research source If you start to feel like she’s making an effort to hang out with you, you’re in a good place. “Taurus tends to keep their social circle small, and it's hard to break in. If a Taurus is going out of their way to spend time with you and is trying to invite you into that circle, then that is a sign that there's some interest,” Garbis explains. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Be romantic and traditional while courting her.
steps.content: Be romantic and traditional while courting her. Taurus is ruled by Venus, the planet of love, so it’s no surprise that Taurus women appreciate an old-school romantic gesture. [4] X Research source Try things like bringing her a beautiful bouquet of flowers, writing her a sweet letter, holding doors open for her, or giving her a kiss on the cheek when you say goodbye. These chivalrous, romantic actions can definitely go a long way to get her thinking about you. If you’re buying her flowers, try to pick something on the higher-end side. Their ruling planet Venus is also associated with beauty and wealth, so Taureans are suckers for luxurious gifts, explains Garbis. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Put in effort to look and smell good when you see her.
steps.content: Put in effort to look and smell good when you see her. Due to their connection to Venus, Taurus women have a deep appreciation for beauty and aesthetics. They’re also very sensual, so they respond well to soft textures and nice smells . Because of this, a well thought-out outfit and a luxurious fragrance can definitely make you more attractive to a Taurus, Garbis explains. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022. “Dress your very best in nice textiles and patterns. Wear silk ties and luxurious suits made of soft fabric. She likes touching and is drawn towards fancy fabrics and patterns. Make your hair touchable, and don’t load it with too much product—she likes running her fingers through hair, so make sure it’s not gunky,” Garbis suggests. “Wearing expensive cologne will make her go crazy, and she is into status symbols, so wear a nice watch and bring roses to the first date,” Garbis adds. [7] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022.

steps.title: Cook her a delicious meal or take her to a fancy restaurant.
steps.content: Cook her a delicious meal or take her to a fancy restaurant. Garbis explains that the best way to a sensual Taurus’s heart is through her stomach. “They love food and would enjoy a savory home-cooked meal,” says Garbis. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. And, since Tauruses are also suckers for luxury, “she would be extra impressed if you invited her to a very expensive restaurant,” Eyedealism adds. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. If you do decide to cook her a meal at home, make sure to appeal to all her senses with your decor and ambiance. Luxurious scented candles , mood lighting, beautiful flowers, and nice place settings on your table are all key!

steps.title: Get her a gift to show her you’re thinking of her.
steps.content: Get her a gift to show her you’re thinking of her. Luxury-loving Taurus always appreciates a nice gift. Tauruses also love to make their living spaces a cozy sanctuary, so home decor items make amazing presents for them. “Getting a richly scented candle or a fancy pillow would be a good choice,” says Garbis. [10] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Be upfront about how you feel.
steps.content: Be upfront about how you feel. A no-nonsense Taurus woman doesn’t respond well when people play hard-to-get. “Tauruses don’t want to run, and they don’t want to jump through hoops or chase,” says Garbis. [11] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Don’t be all over her one day and indifferent the next. She won’t appreciate this inconsistency, and it may drive her to end things. If you really like her, being direct and honest about it from the get-go is the best course of action.

steps.title: Be consistent and reliable to help her feel secure.
steps.content: Be consistent and reliable to help her feel secure. A Taurus woman “wants to know that you’re loyal, and they’re not really trusting,” says Eyedealism. [12] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. So, if you “show them that you’ll show up…they’re more likely to fall in love with you,” she says. [13] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Don’t be flaky. Show up on time to your dates, and don’t cancel plans at the last minute. If you absolutely have to be late or reschedule, make sure to communicate this with her as early as you can so she doesn’t think you’re blowing her off. Stick to your word. If you say you’re going to do something for her, follow through and do it. When you’re true to your word, she’s more likely to trust you and see you as a reliable potential partner.

steps.title: Show her that you share her values and goals.
steps.content: Show her that you share her values and goals. Eyedealism explains that a Taurus woman likes stability and tends to be very traditional, so she wants a partner who will work toward these ideals with her. [14] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. If you show her that you’re on the same page about things like financial security, career goals, buying a house, and planning your lives out together, she’s much more likely to see a future with you, says Eyedealism. [15] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Show off your ambitious side when you’re around her. Let her know what you’re hoping to achieve in your career, or mention the projects you’re working on that you’re passionate about. She'll want to know more about your plans and goals!

steps.title: Be physically affectionate.
steps.content: Be physically affectionate. A sensual Taurus usually prefers a lot of touch in romantic relationships. [16] X Research source If you want to make her feel super connected to you, try going out of your way to show her physical affection . Snuggling, holding hands, putting your arm around her, hugging, and kissing are all great ways to melt a Taurus’s heart. You can even go all out and “make a fast track to their heart by breaking out the massage oil and giving them a sensual rub down,” says Garbis. [17] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021.

steps.title: Be understanding of the fact that she can be a bit stubborn.
steps.content: Be understanding of the fact that she can be a bit stubborn. “Taurus is a fixed sign and is the stubborn bull. It’s hard to get a fixed bull to move unless it really wants to move,” says Garbis. [18] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. As a result, Taurus women have a reputation for being a bit set in their ways, and it’s hard to get them to change their opinion about something (even when they’re wrong). If you’re building a long-term relationship with a Taurus woman, you’ll need to be patient with her when she’s showing her bull-headed side. [19] X Research source Luckily, there's also a super positive side to Taurus's fixed nature—it makes her very strong in her convictions, and she has no problem standing up for what's right. Reader Poll: We asked 827 wikiHow readers what the most negative traits in Taureans are, and 56% of them said stubbornness and resistance to change. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Remember that she desires stability and comfort above all.
steps.content: Remember that she desires stability and comfort above all. Known for their tendency to be homebodies at times, Taurus women are more likely to want a cozy night in than a crazy night out on the town. [20] X Research source If you’re in it for the long haul with a Taurus woman, understand that she prefers safety and security, and she isn’t huge on taking risks or doing wild, spontaneous things. No, she's not super adventurous, and she doesn't get caught up in fantasy land. What's wrong with that? She lives in the real world and has real things that matter to her. Some people may see her desire for stability as boring, but it also makes her incredibly dependable, steady, and hard-working. These are all major attributes!

steps.title: Don't play with her emotions, and watch out for her temper.
steps.content: Don't play with her emotions, and watch out for her temper. Yes, Taurus women are dependable, loyal, reliable, and sweet — but that doesn't mean you can mess with her. She's also very into respect and treating others as they deserve to be treated. So, if you aim to manipulate or use her, she'll show you the door. Taurus’s symbol is the bull, and those horns of hers can be quite pointy if you do something that causes her to charge at you! [21] X Research source

steps.title: Be as faithful and devoted as she is.
steps.content: Be as faithful and devoted as she is. Once you've got her, try your hardest to treat her as well as she treats you. Taurus women are known for being incredibly loyal, patient, and trustworthy partners. If she falls in love with you, she’ll stand by you and show up for you no matter what. Pay her back by matching this energy! [22] X Research source

steps.title: Taurus is represented by the symbol of the bull.
steps.content: Taurus is represented by the symbol of the bull. “Due to their fixed earth natures, Tauruses tend to be loyal, materialistic, stable, financially secure, honest, and sometimes stubborn," says Garbis. "Being ruled by Venus also brings out a highly sensual and physically affectionate side that is very tactile. They enjoy luxury, the best of everything, and having luxurious houses filled with velvet and satin and lots of pillows and fine art." [23] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 11 October 2022. Here’s a quick breakdown: Element: Earth Modality: Fixed Planet: Venus Symbol: The Bull Most Compatible Signs: Virgo, Capricorn, Pisces, Cancer, Scorpio, Libra Keywords: strong, persevering, stable, steady, stubborn, dependable, reliable, sensual [24] X Research source
